modName: Mythic Dawn - Return of the Cult
descriptionHtml:
The Mod along with all the info will be placed here, within the month!
Feel free to ask any pre-question about this mod! I will be monitoring this and constantly updating info as a design it! This mod will be at a good point some time this month to be uploaded!

The first update will include just the Mythic Dawn at a little camp located South of Riverwood (near by).

This mod will feature:
-1 new area, \"Fort Ravahr\" (Home of the new Mythic Dawn)
-New Quest / Forever Vanquish the Mythic Dawn
-New NPC Faction (Mythic Dawn)
-Mythic Dawn Robe /  Hood
--Male and Female
-2 new Mythic Dawn spells
-more to come

SO! Don\'t feel reluctant to bookmark this if you are ready for a new story about the Mythic Dawn and their return to the realms of TES.

-images soon-
author: Neokrieg
